lemming.user

Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • lemming.data.GenericDao<User>
      • lemming.user.UserDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDao<User>, IUserDao

    public class UserDao
extends GenericDao<User>
implements IUserDao
    Represents a Data Access Object providing data operations for users.
